data.name: Cybertruck Sim
data.detailed_description:
Cybertruck Simulator is all about the true reason the vehicle exists, with the most unrealistically accurate physics possible, the goal here is to simply have fun.

This game was written for free, for the sure purpose of ridiculousness.

Complete with an open world, leveling system, achievements and upgrades. Cybertruck Simulator is a new breed of free game that goes back to 90's game mechanics roots with a modern twist.


- Enjoy driving Cybertruck on Real Mars
- Quests
- Collectables to gain XP and achievements
- Unlockable upgrades including color, physics, effects and accessories (Mods).
- Deliver cargo to build bases
- Terraform Mars
- Help Starmen
- Online Multiplayer coming soon

- No Ads or waiting

Featuring Music by RIZ LA VIE and other Tesla inspired artists.


Questions? Feature Requests? Tweet @1stMarsColonist

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
